Conference.Description: This is a typical setup for a conference that includes basic sound lighting and video. Supports attendances of up to 300 people.

Concert.Description: This is a common event setup for a performing band. It includes microphones and a mixer necessary for supporting vocal and instrumental sound sources, as well as basic lighting. Supports attendances of up to 500 people.
